name: Flocking Sheep
description:
You're a sheepdog trying to wrangle unruly sheep into a pen! Sheep generally flock together, allowing you to drive them all in a direction, but also have a tendency to wander off when bored and scatter when chased, so you'll need to be careful.

With simple controls, sheep that are equal parts cute and infuriating, and only one level, you're sure to be left wanting more!

This game was made in 32 hours at Adelaide Game Jam #5, for the theme "flow". More details at:
http://www.jamalaide.org.au/jams/agj-5/flocking-sheep
